member.name: T:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice
member.summary:
Washer device
The Washer device is an \ref AccessibleDevices "accessible device" representing exactly one sias washer module on a sias instrument.
member.details:
\ingroup Dev_Washer
The interface includes - configuration properties for washer scaling factor and offset - a layout property for the washer slot - methods for wash volume and wash item conversions - methods for starting a wash process .
\b Important: This device only supports full featured washers. This washers are able to process a full wash with a single command. The washer type adaption is done by the modules firmware.
%SWasherDevice class diagram
\image html "SWasherDevice.png"

member.name: M:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.GetErrorInfos
member.summary: This interface function returns the default error messages which can be generated by this device.

member.name: M:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.HandleModuleError(System.Boolean,System.Object[])
member.summary: This method handles the module errors of SMotor devices
member.details: Possible Module types: - 0x0048 (\ref Sias::CanDev::eMODULE_TYPE_CONST "MT_Washer") - 0x0049 (\ref Sias::CanDev::eMODULE_TYPE_CONST "MT_ICB_Washer") . Handled errors: - none .
member.param: true to force the handler to handle the error

member.name: M:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.WashTime(System.Double)
member.summary: Translate a wash volume to a wash time
member.returns: Wash time for given wash volume

member.name: M:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.WashVolume(System.Int32)
member.summary: Translate a wash time to a wash volume
member.returns: Wash volume for given wash time

member.name: M:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.StartWash(System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.Double)
member.summary: Start washer command. This command starts the washer
member.param: Rows to wash (each bit represents a row)\n Attention: Some Washers may not support individual row washing. In this case the washer may wash unselected rows also.

member.name: M:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.IsSlotAccessible
member.summary: Check if the washer slot is accessible
member.returns: True if slot is accessible, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.AllowAccess(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Allow/deny accessing the washer device slot
member.param: true to allow, false to deny access

member.name: F:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.ActualLayoutDevice
member.summary: Actual layout device. E.g. for sending the display state to layout

member.name: M:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.AttachLayoutData(Sias.Core.Interfaces.ILayoutDevice)
member.summary:
Attach layout data.
This method tries to attach the layout data found at the given layout device to the device. If this will succeed it returns true. If it fails it returns false. In this case the calling method should retry until it finds a fitting layout device.
member.param: The layout device to attach or null to unattach an attached layout device.
member.returns: true if attachable, false if not

member.name: M:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.GetAccessMode(System.Object)
member.summary: Get access mode. This Method is used to request the actual access mode.
member.returns: Access mode for the given caller object

member.name: M:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.SetAccessMode(System.Object,Sias.Core.Interfaces.SAccessMode,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set access mode. This method prepares the washer module to allow the requested access.
member.remarks: Remarks: - If the timeout is longer than the remaining washer time the function will not wait for the finished timeout. It will return inaccessible immediately. - There is not way to stop the washer yet, so AccessMode.RequestInterruption will of course not stop the washer. .

member.name: P:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.ScalingFactor
member.summary:
Get/Set the ScalingFactor of the SWasherDevice
The scaling factor defines the time in ms needed to dispense (wash) 1 µl

member.name: P:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.ScalingOffset
member.summary: Get/Set the ScalingOffset of the SWasherDevice [ms]

member.name: P:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.Slot
member.summary:
Washer plate slot property
This is the slot where the item to get washed has to get placed.

member.name: T:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.ErrorCodes
member.summary: This static class keeps the error code constants of the \ref Sias::Washer::SWasherDevice errors.

member.name: F:Sias.Washer.SWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.TimeoutError
member.summary: 0x1350: Washer timeout error, either no answer from washer or active for more then 30 min (10 min for FW 0.06 or earlier)
